### Description
As a Besu user, I have chosen this client for its low storage requirements and low state growth. I want to ensure that this remains true through the lifetime of a Besu validating node. I want access to either improved state reduction or new features similar to pruning/frozen data that could remove old/historical data and lower my requirements over time. 

### Acceptance Criteria
* State growth stable around ~10GB a week or lower
* Exploration of synergies between checkpoint sync, in-protocol deposits, and removing old data outside of subjectivity period / deposit contract logs. See #5295. 

###  To-Do
- [ ] Removal of duplicated state data like bytecode saved by address (needed for snap server) #5388
- [ ] Removal of old trie logs, depending on user-specified historical block limit #5390 (might not be needed)
- [ ] Moving trielog to the rockdb blob part #5866
- [ ] Receipt strategy #5767 ( Zero lead byte changes #5392, Bloom filters (?))
- [ ] Ability to freeze historical data to a flat file that I can store offline or in a slower/cheaper database #5389
